item.name: User Management
item.description: Complete user management system including profile, addresses, and settings

request.description: Update the authenticated user's profile information

item.name: User Addresses
item.description: User address management with full CRUD operations for shipping and billing addresses

request.description: Get all addresses for the authenticated user (both shipping and billing addresses)
request.name: List User Addresses

request.description: Get user addresses with pagination support
request.name: List User Addresses with Pagination

request.description: Create a new billing address for the authenticated user
request.name: Create Billing Address

request.description: Create a new shipping address for the authenticated user
request.name: Create Shipping Address

request.description: Get details of a specific user address by UUID
request.name: Show Specific Address

body.raw:
{
  "type": "billing",
  "is_default": true,
  "first_name": "John Updated",
  "last_name": "Doe Updated",
  "company": "Updated Company Ltd",
  "address_line_1": "789 Updated Street",
  "address_line_2": "Floor 5",
  "city": "Istanbul",
  "state": "Marmara",
  "postal_code": "34100",
  "country_uuid": "{{country_uuid}}",
  "phone": "+90 555 111 2233"
}

item.name: Shipping
item.description: Shipping method management endpoints for order fulfillment and delivery options

exec: pm.test('Shipping methods data is an array', function () {
pm.test('Each shipping method has required properties', function () {
pm.test('Price is a valid number format', function () {
pm.test('Delivery days are valid integers', function () {
pm.test('Methods are sorted by sort_order and price', function () {
// Save first shipping method UUID for other requests
pm.test('Save first shipping method UUID', function () {

response.name: Successful Response - Active Shipping Methods
response.body:
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Shipping methods retrieved successfully.",
    "data": [
        {
            "uuid": "01912345-6789-7123-8901-234567890123",
            "name": "Standard Shipping",
            "description": "Standard delivery within business days",
            "price": "9.99",
            "min_delivery_days": 3,
            "max_delivery_days": 5,
            "is_active": true,
            "sort_order": 1,
            "delivery_time": "3-5 business days",
            "created_at": "2025-08-24T11:41:55.000000Z",
            "updated_at": "2025-08-24T11:41:55.000000Z"
        },
        {
            "uuid": "01912345-6789-7123-8901-234567890124",
            "name": "Express Shipping",
            "description": "Fast delivery for urgent orders",
            "price": "19.99",
            "min_delivery_days": 1,
            "max_delivery_days": 2,
            "is_active": true,
            "sort_order": 2,
            "delivery_time": "1-2 business days",
            "created_at": "2025-08-24T11:41:55.000000Z",
            "updated_at": "2025-08-24T11:41:55.000000Z"
        },
        {
            "uuid": "01912345-6789-7123-8901-234567890125",
            "name": "Next Day Delivery",
            "description": "Get your order tomorrow",
            "price": "29.99",
            "min_delivery_days": 1,
            "max_delivery_days": 1,
            "is_active": true,
            "sort_order": 3,
            "delivery_time": "1 business day",
            "created_at": "2025-08-24T11:41:55.000000Z",
            "updated_at": "2025-08-24T11:41:55.000000Z"
